title: OXO Smooth Potato Masher
description: This innovative Potato Masher lets you make smooth mashed potatoes with less pressure on your hands. A broad, soft, horizontal handle lets you press straight down while it cushions your grip and absorbs pressure. A fine-grid, stainless steel mashing plate yields smooth mashed potatoes with no lumps. This tool is also ideal for mashing yams, carrots, or other root vegetables, or for making homemade baby food by mashing apples or bananas.

This innovative Potato Masher lets you make smooth mashed potatoes with less pressure on your hands. A broad, soft, horizontal handle lets you press straight down while it cushions your grip and absorbs pressure. A fine-grid, stainless steel mashing plate yields smooth mashed potatoes with no lumps. This tool is also ideal for mashing yams, carrots, or other root vegetables, or for making homemade baby food by mashing apples or bananas.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Every year around thanksgiving at the OXO office we have a pot luck and we all bring our holiday side dishes. So whether we're making smooth mash potatoes, mashed carrots or sweet potato pie, the OXO smooth potato master always comes in handy. This innovative potato master lets you make smooth mashed potatoes with less pressure on you hands. A broad soft horizontal handle lets you press straight down while it cushions your grip and absorbs pressure. A fine grid stainless steel mashing plate yields smooth mashed potatoes with no lumps. This tools is also ideal fro mashing yams, carrots or other root vegetables or for making homemade baby food by mashing apples or bananas.  Here's a good tip. When you're grounding up ground beef, use the potato masher to break up the meat in the pan.
